Class Admin

java.lang.Object
user.User
user.Admin
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserActions
public class Admin extends User
an admin action such as updating ticket prices, viewing bookings and viewing total payment.

    • mainMenu

      public void mainMenu(ArrayList<concert.Concert> concerts, HashMap<String,concert.Venue> venues, ArrayList<booking.Booking> bookings, int... id)

      Parameters:
      concerts - List of concerts.
      venues - Map of venue names to Venue objects.
      bookings - List of bookings.
      id - optional IDs.

    • selectConcert

      public int selectConcert(ArrayList<concert.Concert> concerts, HashMap<String,concert.Venue> venues, ArrayList<booking.Booking> bookings)
      select a concert from the list of concerts.
      Parameters:
      concerts - List of concerts.
      venues - Map of venue names to Venue objects.
      bookings - List of bookings.
      Returns:
      The ID of the selected concert.

    • updateConcert

      public void updateConcert(ArrayList<concert.Concert> updateConcerts, String concertPath)
      Writes the concert price to a concert file.
      Parameters:
      updateConcerts - List of concerts to be updated.
      concertPath - Path to the concert file.
